```{r}
SharkAttackdata <- read.csv("../data/SharkAttackdata.csv")
```


```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
```



```{r}
Water_area_freq <- count(SharkAttackdata, 'water_area')
```


```{r}
ggplot(Water_area_freq,aes(x=freq)) +
  geom_histogram()
```
